about_the_game: Cinematic composer and producer Jon R. Mohr delivers an exciting mix of techno and metal elements, along with acoustic instruments such as Uilleann Pipes. Each track is expertly tailored to fit the theme of each level while maintaining the same fast pace that the game demands of the player's performance.
detailed_description: Cinematic composer and producer Jon R. Mohr delivers an exciting mix of techno and metal elements, along with acoustic instruments such as Uilleann Pipes. Each track is expertly tailored to fit the theme of each level while maintaining the same fast pace that the game demands of the player's performance.
name: TurBot Soundtrack
short_description: Cinematic composer and producer Jon R. Mohr delivers an exciting mix of techno and metal elements, along with varied acoustic instruments. Each track is expertly tailored to fit the theme of each level while maintaining the same fast pace that the game demands of the player's performance.
